parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - masculine singular
str2: Egypt -- a son of Ham, also his descendants and their country in Northwest Africa

parse: Verb - Qal - Perfect - third person masculine singular
str2: To bear young, to beget, medically, to act as midwife, to show lineage
Ludim -- a tribe descended from Mizraim
Anam -- a tribe descended from Mizraim, probably located in or near Eg
Lehab -- a tribe descended from Mizraim
Naphtuh -- a tribe descended from Mizraim
